:::config { "language": "javascript", "theme": "slack-theme-dark-mode" }
CustomRenderer.prototype.matchedRangeModifier = function (content, prefix = '') {
    let pattern = new RegExp(escapeRegex(prefix) + ':?((start|end|all|-?[0-9]+)(,-?[0-9]+)?)?', 'i');

    return content.match(pattern);
}
:::expectation
<pre class='phiki language-javascript slack-theme-dark-mode' style='background-color: #222222;color: #E6E6E6;'><code data-theme='slack-theme-dark-mode' data-lang='javascript' class='torchlight' style='--theme-selection-background: #222222'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #E6E6E680; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #4EC9B0;">CustomRenderer</span><span class="token" style="color: #E6E6E6;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #9CDCFE;">prototype</span><span class="token" style="color: #E6E6E6;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #DCDCAA;">matchedRangeModifier</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #d4d4d4;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #569cd6;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #E6E6E6;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #9CDCFE;">content</span><span class="token" style="color: #E6E6E6;">,</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #9CDCFE;">prefix</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #d4d4d4;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #ce9178;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #ce9178;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #E6E6E6;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #E6E6E6;">{</span><span class="token">
